trans-unit.source: Provides access to the property values of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern" /> object using its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Current" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Cached" /> accessors.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce accesso ai valori della proprietà dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern" /> utilizzando le funzioni di accesso <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Current" /> o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.Cached" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> can be maximized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se è possibile ingrandire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> can be maximized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è possibile ingrandire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and is subsequently used to specify the visual state of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> pattern di controllo viene ottenuto da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> e viene successivamente utilizzato per specificare lo stato di visualizzazione di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> can be minimized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> corrente può essere ridotto a icona.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> can be minimized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è possibile ridurre a icona <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and is subsequently used to specify the visual state of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> pattern di controllo viene ottenuto da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> e viene successivamente utilizzato per specificare lo stato di visualizzazione di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> is modal.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> è modale.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> is modal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> è modale; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and is subsequently used to specify the visual state of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> pattern di controllo viene ottenuto da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> e viene successivamente utilizzato per specificare lo stato di visualizzazione di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> is the topmost element in the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> è l'elemento in primo piano nell'ordine z.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> is topmost; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> è più in alto; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler> is defined to listen for changes to the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.IsTopmostProperty> of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler> è definito per l'ascolto delle modifiche per il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.IsTopmostProperty> di un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowInteractionState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowInteractionState" /> di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowInteractionState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowInteractionState" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.WindowInteractionState.Running" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.WindowInteractionState.Running" />.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and is subsequently used to specify the visual state of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> pattern di controllo viene ottenuto da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> e viene successivamente utilizzato per specificare lo stato di visualizzazione di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState" /> di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.WindowVisualState.Normal" />.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and is subsequently used to specify the visual state of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern> pattern di controllo viene ottenuto da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> e viene successivamente utilizzato per specificare lo stato di visualizzazione di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
